hadiths.text: Sufyan narrated from Ibn Tawus, from his father, from Hujr Al-Madari, from Zaid, who said:"The Messenger of Allah said: 'Umra (a gift given for life) is for the heir

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ الاِخْتِلاَفِ عَلَى أَبِي الزُّبَيْرِ
chapter.eng-name: Mentioning The Differences Reported From Abu Az-Zubair
